none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 22, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
One hour radio show from somewhere south of me. I'm not going to mislead you, the first song is really awful, but there are some creamers on here for sure, and I'm a fan of the DJ who talks after every...single...song. Everything from hardcore to grind to noisecore to punk to weird commercial screamo is covered, in other words: "something for everyone." But I know that only about 0.3% of you are going to take the plunge... EL CANDELABRO I want to party with this dude.

seo.title: ¡¡¡REDIOXXX!!! "EL CANDELABRO" - Terminal Escape
